title: Beta client wont accept user/pass?
body:
Downloaded the new Beta client and it says my username/password is invalid. It works perfectly fine on the legacy client. I sent a  ticket to Riot and they responded and I reset my password. The new password works with the legacy client but not with the new one. 

Anyone else have the same problem?

replies.body:
Can you expand the Region/Language options under the Username/Password fields and ensure you're selecting the right Region before logging in? I've included a screenshot below:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this worked.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=VAXNsOjA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-17T04:41:13.963+0000)
>
> Can you expand the Region/Language options under the Username/Password fields and ensure you're selecting the right Region before logging in? I've included a screenshot below:
> 
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg
> 
> Let me know if this worked.

Thanks, I had it under Oceania, sorry for wasting your time.
